Name: name
Text: Comet

Name: d_place
Text:
Planet
Vuomo

Name: d_tokki
Text: Extremely intuitive. Terrible at lying.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Dreams of becoming captain of her own starship.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Escaped her home planet on Chipie's freighter.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Good at seeing through lies; bad at lying.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Her "tattoo" is actually a symbiotic slime mold.

Name: d_tokki
Text: The slime attacks humans once its host dies.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Her dangerous planet has a high mortality rate.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
So we gotta choose who we wanna put into cold sleep
I'm thinking maybe {0}.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
It's the way {0}, like, keeps talking?
It's just like, super sketchy.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
{0}. I think you're totally sketchy.
Remember that.

Name: t_suspect
Text: Hey {0}, why so quiet?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
{0} is sketchy... Uh, I think.
I mean, I'm not sure, but maybe?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Heh, hehehe, {0}?
Something about you is totally fishy, huh?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Oh yeah. I was gonna team up with {0}, but yeah, nope.
I mean, {0} is like, super suspicious, right?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
So like... {0} is the one who took out {1}?
I can just feel it.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
You know, about {0}...
I feel like, things're gonna get bad with them around.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Shut up, {0}.
Quit trying to do everything yourself.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
There's nothing sketchy about {0}.
Like, so not-sketchy that it's sketchy? Ah, hold up...
So like, maybe {0} IS sketchy then?

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Awww...
{0} is so quiet, it's kinda sad.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
So, like, putting my hunch aside for a sec...
Going by "logic", {0} is supposed to be suspicious, right?

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
{0}, look over here real quick...
Hm... Yeeaah, you got "lies" written all over you.

Name: t_suspect_add
Text:
Something about {0} is just kinda fishy.
I mean... Just look at those eyes.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: So {0} is sketchy, huh? Well, duh.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: {0}, what're you trying to hide?

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Oh, we're on {0} now? Yup, I'm in!

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: Hehe, what're you trying to hide? You're being so sketchy, {0}!

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
So like...
Basically, {0} is looking real sketchy right now, huh?
OK, got it.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
I know, right?! {0} is totally fishy.
It's like, there's a serious stink coming off of {0}.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Oh hey, so you totally got that {0} was lying, huh?
Nice one, {1}!

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: Well, we totally need to keep an eye on {0}.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Yeah, I totally thought so, too.
It's like, {0}, why're you trying so hard?

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Hey hold up, {0} might loom sketchy, but... well, yeah.
I mean, it toally makes sense!

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Oh yeah, totally.
I almost forgot {0} was even here.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: Hm... If {1} says so, then I guess we should like, listen?

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: Yeeaah, I'm starting to think {0} is kinda sketchy, too.

Name: t_suspected0
Text: What, me? Like, seriously?

Name: t_suspected0
Text: Awww. Oh well, go ahead and hate me, I don't even care!

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
Why are we all jumping on {0} now?
{0} is cool, you guys.

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
Yeah, {1} is totally sketchy... Wait, what?
Oh, you mean {0}? But like, why?

Name: t_hanron1
Text:
I mean, {0} might seem kinda suspicious...
But there's definitely fishier people here, right?

Name: t_hanron_t0
Text:
I don't think we should all jump on {0} like this.
I just wanna, like, take it easy!

Name: t_hanron_t1
Text: Buck up there, {0}! I got your back!

Name: t_trust
Text:
{0} smells so good, you know?
Like, freshly cut grass out in the sun...

Name: t_trust
Text:
Well, uh... I guess...
If I had to choose, I think {0} is safe, right?

Name: t_trust
Text:
I don't sense any lies from {0} just yet.
I think {0} might be the real thing.

Name: t_trust_r
Text: You know, I think {0} might actually be pretty cool.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Huh? I guess {0} isn't so sketchy after all.
Sorry for doubting you!

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Yeah, {0}...
I think they're being pretty honest.

Name: t_trust_t0
Text:
Hehe, nice!
I'm kind of a {0} fan myself.

Name: t_trust_t1
Text: OK then, I'm gonna get behind {0}, too.

Name: t_trusted0
Text: Ah, really?

Name: t_thanron0
Text: {0}? Yeah, nope.

Name: t_thanron1
Text:
I don't buy it.
I mean, it was {1} who brought this up, right?
I feel like there's something behind this.

Name: t_thanron_t0
Text: Yeah. {0} actually does seem pretty sketchy.

Name: t_thanron_t1
Text: Same here. Something just feels kinda off here.

Name: t_hosho
Text:
It's pretty obvious that {0} is definitely {1}.
Any objections?

Name: t_hosho
Text: {0} is human. I think we can agree on this.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is lying.
There's no way you're {1}.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: {0} is... {1}. They have to be.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: Something about {0} is wrong.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is not Gnosia. This is a fact.
But {0} is lying. This is also a fact.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text: What are you talking about? That's not true.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text: What are you talking about? Duh-doy!

Name: t_hosho_get
Text: Huh, me? Well yeah, I'm the real thing!

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
Oops, that didn't work.
OK, I'll shut up then, so you guys keep going.

Name: t_tohyo_go
Text:
Hm...? Nobody's gonna say anything?
OK then, wanna start the vote?

Name: t_tohyo_mae
Text:
Oh, time to vote, huh? OK OK.
My mind's already been made up.

Name: t_tohyo_sai
Text:
Hey, {0} are tied.
I guess we gotta talk it over and vote again, huh?

Name: t_shokei
Text:
OK then, cold sleep for me, I guess.
Well... Keep at it, you guys! You can do this!

Name: t_shokei
Text:
I'm going off to cold sleep then, huh?
Well, you guys saw through me, so... OK OK.

Name: t_wakare
Text: Let's hang out again sometime, {0}!

Name: t_karare
Text:
Hehehehe... Uh-oh. So it was you, {0}.
Good luck... everybody...

Name: t_imjinro
Text:
Sorry! I'm actually the {0}.
Please, forgive me... Just kidding, I don't care!

Name: t_shori
Text:
So, the {0} is gone, huh? We're all done?
Hehe, what do you guys wanna do now?

Name: t_tohyo_kurikaeshi
Text:
Look, this is never gonna work out, right?
So let's just quit all this voting stuff, you guys!

Name: t_tohyo_jeno
Text:
Let's just freeze all the sketchy people!
It's not like getting frozen is gonna kill you, so let's do it!

Name: t_tohyo_alive
Text:
OK, I just wanna take a bath and go to bed.
Yup, that's exactly what I'm gonna do!

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ok
Text: OK. So cold sleep for everyone, huh? That's OK by me.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ng
Text: Yeeaah... I don't like that.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ok
Text: Yeah, that's fine by me.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ng
Text:
I got a bad feeling about this, so I'm against it.
Hey, look! See? I've got goosebumps.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_kettei
Text:
Well, see you later, {0}.
Don't worry, we'll get through this!

Name: t_tohyo_alive_kettei
Text:
OK? Alright then, {0}.
Wanna get in the bath with me?

Name: t_tohyo_hitei
Text:
No good, huh? Awww.
I thought it was a great idea.

Name: t_tohyo_dame
Text:
Welp, I guess today's just not our day.
Bye-bye. See you tomorrow.

Name: t_co
Text:
I'm gonna find that Gnosia myself! Hehe, sounds cool, right?
Hehe, well I am the {0}, you know! But I'm bad with machines!

Name: t_co
Text:
Lemme put this out there. The {0} is me.
If anyone goes into cold sleep, I'm gonna check you out!

Name: t_co
Text:
I'm actually the {0}.
I've been secretly looking after you guys.

Name: t_co
Text:
So, the Gnosia infection happened at the last station, right?
Then it couldn't be me. I never left the ship.
Sorry if it sounds like I'm cheating or something...

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text:
Well, I'm the {0} and {1} is Gnosia.
That's what the machine said.

Name: t_co_find
Text:
Oh yeah. I'm the {0}, by the way.
{1} was Gnosia. Their brain was all... ew.

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
Hey wait a minute, {1}...
The {0} is me!

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
Oh OK, so {1} is definitely dangerous then.
I mean, I'm supposed to be the only {0} on this ship.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
I stayed on the ship, too, so I can alibi for {1}.
Wait... Is that how you use the word "alibi"?

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_req
Text:
Who's the {0} again?
Huh? Didn't they already come forward?

Name: t_co_after
Text: Hehe, so {1}... one of them is lying, right?

Name: t_co_after
Text:
Wait a sec, there's only one {0}, right?
What a bunch of liars!

Name: t_uranai_o
Text: They got taken out, but...

Name: t_uranai_s
Text: OK, time for my report.

Name: t_uranai_b
Text: OK then, here's my report.

Name: t_uranai_t
Text: I checked out {1}. Yup, {1} is {0}.

Name: t_uranai_f
Text: I checked out {1}. Nothing weird. {1} isn't {0}.

Name: t_uranai_n
Text: Hehe, I didn't really know who to check out...

Name: t_reibai_s
Text: OK, here goes my doctor's report!

Name: t_reibai_t
Text: {1} {3} {0}. Hehe, nailed it!

Name: t_reibai_f
Text:
{1} went into cold sleep, but we were wrong.
Turned out not to be {0}.

Name: t_reibai_ft
Text:
So yesterday, {1} went into cold sleep.
{2} {4} {0}.

Name: t_reibai_ff
Text:
You guys... The {0} assumption was wrong.
Oh well, it's cool! Let's stay positive!

Name: t_houkoku_s
Text: Welp, my report says the same thing.

Name: t_houkoku_w
Text: Hold up, what're you even talking about?

Name: t_okuyami
Text: Oh, {0}... Nope, we gotta try and stay positive!

Name: t_okuyami_n
Text: Hey, everyone's OK! Awesome!

Name: t_okuyami_f
Text:
{0}... Just, why...?
Two at once, that's against the rules...!

Name: t_houkoku_req
Text: OK, so... Who else needs to report?

Name: t_houkoku_not
Text:
No more reports? Then let's wrap this up.
Whoever isn't reporting is hiding something.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Oh yeah, so...
Can you guys try saying "I'm human" for me?

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text: Uh, yeah. I'm human.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Yeeaah, I'm not gonna say that just cuz I was told to.
Sorry.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
So, nobody's gonna say it...?
Awww, this sucks.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
OK, cool, got it. Thanks.
So, why didn't the rest of you guys say it?
That's pretty sketchy, you know.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
OK... Thanks for saying it.
And whoever's lying... Hehe, I'm gonna find out!

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Why'd you make me stop? Oh... OK.
{0}, you're worried I'm gonna know you're lying, huh?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
You know, there's no food from back home on this ship.
They said all the ingredients and spices and stuff were illegal.

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Huh? Whose baby would I wanna have?
C'mon, I can't talk about that in front of everyone!

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
A scary story from back home? How about the armbug?
When they bite you, you grow an extra arm from that spot.

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text: What the hell're you talking about? Stay on track.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
So basically, "vote for whoever claims to be the {0}" then, right?
OK.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
What the hell're you trying to do?
You can tell who's the real thing just by looking.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text: Nope, count me out. Let's stop this, OK?

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
What're you talking about, {1}?
Nobody reported anything like that.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Oh, I get it.
OK then, I guess I'll vote for {0} this time.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Awww, but I'm not even Gnosia...
Can we not do this?

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text: Vote for {0}? Nope, count me out.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Nope, I don't like this, either.
I'll vote for whoever I want.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text: I mean, OK. There are other sketchier people anyway.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
Nope, I wanna decide for myself.
I'm no good with all that logic stuff.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text: Nope, count me out. I gotta bad feeling about this.

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
Yeah, sure.
I mean, you don't seem too sketchy, do you, {0}?

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text: Team up with you? {0}? Hehe, yeeaah, I don't think so.

Name: t_skill_h_help
Text: Me? Help {0}? I mean... why?

Name: t_skill_h_careful
Text:
Hehe, have you noticed?
{0}'s eyes kinda twitch when lying, you know?

Name: t_skill_dogeza
Text: Uh... So what do you guys think about this?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Welp, I guess you got me.
Now that it's out there, I feel kinda relieved.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey! Why're you acting all weird?
I already know it's you, so just calm down.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hm... I know that {0} is lying.
Now, if only everyone would trust me on this...

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK, so... {0} is the real deal, right?
OK OK. So am I, so remember that, alright?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey, it's {0}.
Wait a sec... {0}, you're the real thing, right...?
Heh, sorry, I almost forgot.

Name: t_personal
Text:
So {0}, you seem pretty real.
If it turns out you're lying, I'll accept the loss.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I do like you, {0}.
But I gotta separate that from this, you know?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Oh hey, {0}, what a happenstance.
No wait, was it "coincidence", maybe?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey, here comes a sketchy one.
Hehehe, what exactly are you after, hm?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey {0}, anybody you wanna get rid of?
Me? Yeah, I tend to decide based on who I do or don't like.
So I'll leave it up to you, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK then, let's discuss strategy.
I'll find who the liar is, so {0}, you go on the offensive!

Name: t_personal
Text:
You know, {0}...
I-I'm... Con-con-convert! Convert!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey! Why're you acting all weird?
I already know it's you, so just calm down.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Welp, who knows how this is gonna turn out?
So c'mon {0}, let's keep it light, OK?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yeeaah, you should be careful, {0}.
The trap has been set. You're gonna die.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Oh, it's {0}...
Sorry, but I just don't really like you very much.

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK! So, who's the liar, huh?
Watch out, I'm gonna find you!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey, {0}, listen.
I found the liar!

Name: t_personal
Text:
It's {1}.
Definitely a liar... So be careful, OK?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehehe, leave this to me.
Or actually, let's take down {1} together!

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK.
That's one down.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Let's keep this streak going.
I'm counting on you, {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Oh hey, {0}, perfect timing.
Listen, I got a favor to ask. Well, it's more of a "plan".

Name: t_personal
Text:
You know when I go off on someone for being sketchy?
If I do it alone, I'm worried I'm gonna get taken out.
And then my death would be pointless, you know?

Name: t_personal
Text:
So, like...
I wanna team up with someone I can trust.
I mean you, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK.
I'll keep going on the offensive.
I'm trusting you to back me up, {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehe...
This is actually kinda nice.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Oh man, that sucks.
You know, {0}, I really thought you'd help me out.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Oh well, it's cool.
OK then, see you tomorrow!

Name: t_personal
Text: Hm? What's up, {0}?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Who should we take out tonight, huh?
Hm... Let's just do {1}, I guess.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I mean, we're gonna kill everyone anyway.
Worrying about who goes sooner or later is just a waste of time.

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Hey, it's a bit late for this, but...
Was getting rid of {1} maybe a mistake?)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Sorry if I made things more difficult.
Hehe, I'll apologize now while I still can.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hey, we won!
Hehe, awesome!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Thanks, {0}.
It's nice to be able to rely on someone!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Looks like the Gnosia's all gone!
So, I guess that means we win, right?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Wow, what a surprise.
So {0}, you weren't lying after all, huh?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Sorry about that.
Oh well, we won in the end, so whatever!

Name: t_personal
Text:
You know, that was kinda fun.
{0} and me together, it's kinda nice.

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK, let's hang out again sometime, {0}!
For sure!

Name: t_personal
Text:
With Gnosia, and people disappearing and everything...
Space is like, a super weird place, you know?

Name: t_personal
Text:
I guess you never know what's gonna happen, huh?
That's the fun part of life!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Alright, we totally won.
It all worked out somehow.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Wow, that was easy.
I mean, I didn't even really do anything.

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK, so, where to next?
{0} and me together... We can take down anyone!

Name: t_personal
Text:
You know, {0}, you're an awesome liar.
I'm like, complimenting you, you know!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Anyone ever tell you you'd make a good criminal?
That's a compliment, of course.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Wow, it's finally over.
What a relief.

Name: t_personal
Text:
OK, let's go crazy.
Maybe I'll start with {0}!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hm, so it's over.
OK, so I guess I destroy the universe now, huh?

Name: t_personal
Text:
I mean, I'm a Bug, so, you know.
Hehe... Don't stare at me like that!
I'm gonna blush!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Wow, {0}, you're really something.
Fooling everyone and helping us Gnosia win like that!

Name: t_personal
Text:
So yeah, thanks.
You know, {0}, without you, I would've been screwed.
I would've been shot out into space or something, for sure!

Name: t_temp
Text:
Extremely intuitive, easily seeing through lies.
Very brave, social, and playful.
Utterly lacking logic, she relies on emotion
over probability, and doubts others often.
